metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13389 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: RainLoop Webmail before 1.13.0 lacks XSS protection mechanisms such as xlink:href validation, the X-XSS-Protection header, and the Content-Security-Policy header.

notes.Note: evancaville> rainloop in Focal is currently FTBFS. There are restrictions for patching outlined in https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/2029315

criterions.comment: rainloop package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
